body.div: This document is in the process of being reorganized as part of our ongoing documentation effort. Please follow the links below to find information that has previously been hosted on this page.
body.p: We are in the process of upgrading OODT documentation. In the near future, we hope to provide information for developers regarding each component, including its purpose, structure, interfaces, and configuration points in a Developer Guide.

Information for users, including installation and basic configuration, as well as example usage are provided in a Basic User Guide. Advanced topics, like look and feel, lessons-learned, and best practices are provided in an Advanced User Guide.
Finally, we are planning to provide a number of case studies in the future, in which multi-component deployments are configured to handle common data and computation management scenarios.
